data.title: Four die in food poisoning outbreak in Japan
data.meta_description:
Three primary school children and an 84 year old woman have died in a serious outbreak of food poisoning in Japan. A further 26 children are in a critical condition, including two girls aged 7 and 12 years who are in a coma.

Over 8000 cases have been reported this year, mostly in the past few weeks. The cause of the outbreak is …
